item.title: Remembering the Las Vegas Club: A Downtown Icon's Legacy | Vintage Las Vegas
item.description:
A Downtown Legend: The Las Vegas Club

The Las Vegas Club. Just the name evokes a specific era of Downtown Las Vegas â€“ a time of gritty charm, burgeoning entertainment, and the dawn of themed casino experiences. For 85 years, it stood as an anchor on Fremont Street, a testament to the city’s evolving identity. Its closure in 2015 marked the end of an era, but its legacy lives on in the memories of countless visitors and locals.
